Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes members or officers of the state police who were previously firefighters receive credit for such previous firefighter service
Summary: Authorizes members or officers of the state police who were previously firefighters receive credit for such previous firefighter service for the purposes of retirement.
LawCode: Amd ยง381-b, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to authorizing members or officers of the state police who were previously firefighters to count such firefighter service towards such member's or officer's retirement plan
